channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 00:15 Alarm lifted in Donetsk region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🟢 00:15 Alarm lifted in Donetsk region. Follow further messages. #Donetsk_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 23:32 The alarm has been sounded in the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyansky District- Kharkiv District- Lipetsk Territorial Community- Vovchan Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 23:32 The alarm has been sounded in the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyansky District- Kharkiv District- Lipetsk Territorial Community- Vovchan Territorial Community#Харківська_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 21:41 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
item.description: 🔴 21:41 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling.
